jcr:content.jcr:title: Identity management
jcr:content.browserTitle: Customer identity management | Adobe Audience Manager
jcr:content.metaDescription: Map out every customer’s path to purchase across devices, and manage customer profiles without hosting any personally identifiable information.
jcr:content.tagsKeywords: identity management, customer identity management, customer identity

promo.productIntroText: See how Adobe Campaign can help your business.

free.productIntroText: See how Adobe Campaign can help your business.

paid.productIntroText: See how Adobe Campaign can help your business.

mmarquee.text: Build audience profiles that you can use anywhere.

text_21bd.text: Market to customers. Not datapoints.

text_849b.text: In today’s highly personalized world, strategic marketers are managing identities — not just data. With Audience Manager, you can map out every consumer’s path to purchase across screens and devices. You’ll deliver engaging experiences to individuals and build deeper relationships that drive loyalty and revenue.

text_be12.text: Onboard first-party and CRM data without hosting personally identifiable information (PII).

text_62e4.text: Create 360-degree, anonymous profiles of your audiences.

text_83ea.text: Use second- and third- party data to gain a deeper understanding of your customers.

text_cfb6.text: Extend your reach and control frequency across channels to deliver seamless messages.

text_4c5b.text: Get your data in a row.

text_e478.text: Ingest and organize all your first-party data — including customer analytics and CRM data — into a single customer profile. And manage it without ever hosting any PII.

text_60d8.text: A bird’s-eye view of your customers. Soaring results.

text_d0e7.text: Merge profiles to create a unified view of your customers’ activity across devices. With a 360-degree view of your customers, you can deliver more engaging experiences that tell stories across screens.

text_bdf2.text: Multiply your resources. Simplify your data management.

text_ff77.text: Add to your first-party identity management capabilities with second-party data. With Adobe Device Co-Op, you can work with other brands to better identify customers, wherever they engage — without ever leaving Audience Manager. That means less time tracking devices, and more time delivering great experiences.

text_aef8.text: Map out your customers’ journey.

text_1f7c.text: With Adobe’s device graph, you can understand how your customers are interacting with your brand across multiple devices. You’ll further your audience reach, control frequency, and deliver valuable and consistent experiences to customers across touchpoints.

text_63a3.text: Customer experiences matter. Which means your DMP matters.

text_7978.text: See why we are a Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Data Management Platforms, Q2 2017.

text_150b.text: Do more with your marketing.

text_c558.text: Define your audience ›

text_6aff.text: Grow audiences with customer intelligence ›

text_9fe.text: Efficiently reach your target audience ›
